name: groovelauncher

scripts.build-watch: npx concurrently "npm run build-watch:webpack" "npm run build-watch:scss" "npm run build-watch:internal-apps" "npm run build-watch:android"
scripts.build-watch:android: npx concurrently "npm run build:android-assets" "chokidar 'www/**/*' -c 'npm run build:android-assets'"
scripts.build-watch:web: npx concurrently "npm run build-watch:webpack" "npm run build-watch:scss" "npm run build-watch:internal-apps"
scripts.build: npm run build:webpack && npm run build:scss && npm run build:internal-apps && npm run build:android-assets
scripts.build:production: npx rimraf android/app/src/main/assets/* && npx webpack --env production && npx sass --no-source-map --style=compressed src/styles.scss www/dist/styles.css && node ./scripts/build-internal-apps.js --production && npm run build:android-assets && echo Compilation completed.
scripts.build:debug: npx rimraf android/app/src/main/assets/* && npx webpack && npx sass --no-source-map src/styles.scss www/dist/styles.css && node ./scripts/build-internal-apps.js && npm run build:android-assets && echo Compilation completed.
scripts.build:android:nightly:webview: npm run build:production && cd android && ./gradlew assembleNightlyRelease -Pandroid.injected.signing.store.file=app/keystore.jks -Pandroid.injected.signing.store.password=$KEYSTORE_PASSWORD -Pandroid.injected.signing.key.alias=key0 -Pandroid.injected.signing.key.password=$KEY_PASSWORD -Pandroid.injected.flavor=nightly && cd ..
scripts.build:android:nightly:geckoview: npm run build:production && cd android && ./gradlew assembleNightlyGeckoViewRelease -Pandroid.injected.signing.store.file=app/keystore.jks -Pandroid.injected.signing.store.password=$KEYSTORE_PASSWORD -Pandroid.injected.signing.key.alias=key0 -Pandroid.injected.signing.key.password=$KEY_PASSWORD && cd ..
scripts.build:android:nightly: npm run build:android:nightly:webview && npm run build:android:nightly:geckoview
scripts.debug:android: npm run build:debug && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebugFlavor && cd .. && adb install android/app/build/outputs/apk/debugFlavor/debug/app-debugFlavor-debug.apk && adb shell am start -n web.bmdominatezz.gravy.debug/web.bmdominatezz.gravy.MainActivity
scripts.debug:android:geckoview: npm run build:debug && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebugFlavorGeckoView && cd .. && adb install android/app/build/outputs/apk/debugFlavorGeckoView/release/app-debugFlavorGeckoView-arm64-v8a-release.apk && adb shell am start -n web.bmdominatezz.gravy.debug/web.bmdominatezz.gravy.MainActivity
